posts.post_title: Cards for sale updated with lower prices
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bryan Long
Some cards I have to sale right now are:







PSA 2 e93 Frank Chance - $200



SGC 10 Butter Cream R306 Mickey Cochrane - $225



PSA 2 T222 Frank Chance - $400



SGC 20 T200 Philadelphia Americans - $150



SGC 30 T200 Philadelphia Nationals - $175

Feel free to e-mail me.  I also am willing to part with any of these cards for Oxford Confectionery cards that I need.
